awd_titl_txt: Shear Wall Resistance of Lightgage Steel Stud Wall Systems
awd_abstract_narration: This research project will evaluate the lateral load resistance of              lightgage steel stud walls in the construction of midrise buildings in          seismically active regions of the country.  The investigation will              utilize both analysis and experimentation to evaluate the shear wall            resistance of two actual midrise buildings located in highly seismic            regions that were designed with representative lightgage steel stud wall        systems.  Additionally, the research program will conduct monotonic load        deflection tests and pseudodynamic load reversal tests on two types of          actual lightgage steel stud wall systems.  Determinations of strength,          load/deflection characteristics, and failure modes will be made and             recommendations for the design and construction of lightgage steel stud         wall systems will be provided.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
